application.intro: Funds from SGG Club are used for:

list_html.1: Home renovations and repairs for people in need;
list_html.2: Purchase of furniture and essential equipment to improve living conditions;
list_html.3: Support to improve necessary conditions to turn a house into a home;
list_html.4: Development of new initiatives and partnerships to expand the club’s impact.

sources.description_html: SGG Club funds its actions through real estate referrals – When a member refers someone looking to buy or sell a home, part of the transaction commission goes toward housing support for people in need.

general.definition: These regulations define the club’s operating rules, the rights and duties of members, and the criteria for supporting beneficiaries.
general.mission_html: The mission of SGG Club is to positively contribute to improving housing conditions for those most in need, by mobilising resources and people to create dignified homes.
general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.values_html: The club operates based on the values of dignity, solidarity, value creation, and sharing.

list.1: Respect the club's values and principles;
list.2: Contribute actively within their means, whether through referrals or volunteering;
list.3: Act with transparency and ethics in all interactions related to the club;
list.4: Identify people or situations that may benefit from the club’s support.

choice.description: Ambassadors are chosen directly by those in charge of the SGG Club, based on their involvement and active contribution.
choice.subtitle: Choosing Ambassadors:

ambassadors.description: Ambassadors are characterised by their active involvement, regular commitment, and initiative in helping grow the club - mainly through the continuous referral of real estate deals and identification of situations that may require the club’s intervention. They are members who consistently propose and develop new ideas and actions, taking greater responsibility in achieving the club’s mission.

list.1: Regular participation in meetings and initiatives;
list.2: Proposing new ideas and actions to enhance the club’s impact;
list.3: Supporting the club’s leaders in promoting its mission and values.

loss_of_status.description: An ambassador may be reinstated if he or she moves significantly away from the core of the club's involvement, subject to a decision by those responsible.
loss_of_status.subtitle: Loss of Status:

ambassadors.title: Ambassadors

members.description: Members are individuals selected to be part of SGG Club, but whose participation is not yet fully active. They are in a pre-membership phase and, once they identify or refer a viable real estate opportunity, they will become ambassadors.
members.title: Members

rights.intro: SGG Club members have the right to:

list.1: Take part in initiatives promoted by the club;
list.2: Follow the supported projects and the impact generated;
list.3: Propose new actions and initiatives aligned with the club’s mission;
list.4: Receive regular updates about the club’s activities and development.

rights.title: 2.2. Members' Rights

who_can.intro: Anyone can become a member of SGG Club:

list.1: Individuals who want to support the cause by referring real estate purchase or sale deals;
list.2: Companies and professionals in the real estate, construction or home services sectors who wish to contribute or partner;
list.3: Anyone who identifies with the club’s values and wants to support its mission.
